edu.handong.csee.java.chatcounter

Class MessageFilter

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.handong.csee.java.chatcounter.ChatMessageCounter
      • edu.handong.csee.java.chatcounter.MessageFilter

  • public class MessageFilter
extends ChatMessageCounter
    MessageFilter class is a subclass of ChatMessageCounter.

    This class like the name says, filters the list of names and reduces it and passes it back to the user so that they can use it to calculate the message count. This class basically adds and calculates data to the list of names and filters it and uses methods of its superclass to get the HashMap value.

    Author:
    Jun Seob Lee

    • Method Detail

      • calculateNames

        public void calculateNames()
        This is the calculateNames() method

        This method calls a private method getNames and reduces the value of the whole list of names into non-conflicting list of names. Also calls its superclass's setData method to set the data and calculateCounter() method to calculate the message counter.

      • getHashMap

        public java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.Integer> getHashMap()
        This is the getHashMap() method

        This getter method is overridden from its superclass.

        Overrides:
        getHashMap in class ChatMessageCounter
        Returns:
        the sorted HashMap that contains names and its message count
